Articles.Content:
Hello,This is my first Thread, In here i want to show my KSA-Intrepid, An Orbit and return to KSC capable vehicle.

REQUIRED ADDONS:

MechJeb

TiberDyne Aerospace R&D Division - Shuttle System Version 3.0

Download:[ATTACH]34312[/ATTACH]

Flight Manual (Without MechJeb)

Turn on ASAS, Take off at Full Trust, At 10 kms do a gravity turn, make your apoapsis 100kms, then circularaze.

Enjoy!

Edited October 6, 2012 by gmpd2000
